resources.string: You are turning on Face Login, the system will open the camera to get the face picture, after the picture is verified, you will be able to use the Face Login when you log in next time.
Picture verification failed，please take selfies and make sure that no other factors interfere， Using photos and non-faces will cause the verification to fail.please try again after confirmation.
Face recognition failed. Please ensure that the owner of the account.
You have not turned on face recognition yet，You can click [Go to Set] to open，or click [Cancel]，then open in [Me]-[Settings]-[Biometric Identification]-[Face Recognition].

Face recognition failed，Please ensure that the owner of %s，if multiple attempts fail，please use another way to login，then replace the archive picture in [Me]-[Settings]-[Biometric Identification]-[Face Recognition].
